translations: 痛苦的；剧烈的；寒冷的（bitter 的形容词最高级）

sentences.sentence: It was the bitterest reproach he had made.
sentences.translation: 这是他的最苛刻的责备了。

sentences.sentence: I must seek Salvation from my bitterest friend, my Dearest enemy.
sentences.translation: 我必须从最亲密的敌人（亦是刻薄的朋友）那里寻求帮助。

sentences.sentence: This is destiny... bitter melons are not so bitter, since... I have fully tasted the bitterest of the bitterest.
sentences.translation: 这是命运……苦瓜并没有那么苦，因为我品味过极苦中的极苦。
